name: Breakfast Ball | Interactive golf & social club

metadata.name: Club VIP
metadata.description:
Links Social Club (LSC) is a semi-private social club for golfers and non-golfers alike. Our Club VIP NFT gives its owner priority access the club venue for early simulation bookings, exclusive access to our members only social experiences or sell it later on the secondary market. 
We are turning a traditional membership model into a membership is an asset model.

Our first location in Miami, FL is set to open Q4 2022.

https://www.linkssocialclub.com/

Overview: 
• No applications  
• No monthly dues 
• Private locker for storage 
• Priority access to club venue, early booking and members only private events.

This NFT token gives its owner the Links Social Club membership tier of "Club VIP". The rights, terms and conditions about this token can be found on linkssocialclub.com/terms. They will hold merit as long as this token exists on the blockchain. This token gives it's owner access only to the "Club location" specified in the properties.
